intro: Aspalathus elliptica, commonly known as African red bush, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its small, red or pink flowers that bloom in spring. The plant has small, elliptical leaves and thrives in well-drained soils. It is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits. Aspalathus elliptica is also a popular ornamental plant due to its vibrant flowers and hardy nature.
